     1  package env2config

     3  import (
     4  	"io"
     5  	"io/ioutil"
     6  	"os"
     7  	"path/filepath"
     8  	"testing"
     9  
    10  	"github.com/pkg/errors"
    11  	"github.com/stretchr/testify/assert"
    12  	"github.com/stretchr/testify/require"
    13  )
    14  
    15  func setEnv(t *testing.T, key, value string) {
    16  	prev, exists := os.LookupEnv(key)
    17  	require.NoError(t, os.Setenv(key, value))
    18  	t.Cleanup(func() {
    19  		if exists {
    20  			require.NoError(t, os.Setenv(key, prev))
    21  		} else {
    22  			require.NoError(t, os.Unsetenv(key))
    23  		}
    24  	})
    25  }
    26  
    27  type gorpMarshaler struct {
    28  	marshaledValue  interface{}
    29  	marshalErr      error
    30  	unmarshalResult map[string]interface{}
    31  	unmarshalErr    error
    32  }
    33  
    34  func (g *gorpMarshaler) Marshal(w io.Writer, value interface{}) error {
    35  	g.marshaledValue = value
    36  	return g.marshalErr
    37  }
    38  
    39  func (g *gorpMarshaler) Unmarshal(r io.Reader, value interface{}) error {
    40  	*value.(*map[string]interface{}) = g.unmarshalResult
    41  	return g.unmarshalErr
    42  }
    43  
    44  func TestNew(t *testing.T) {
    45  	RegisterFormat("gorp", &gorpMarshaler{})
    46  	setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_OPTS_FILE", "/some/path.gorp")
    47  	setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_OPTS_FORMAT", "gorp")
    48  
    49  	t.Run("happy path", func(t *testing.T) {
    50  		setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_FOO", "bar")
    51  		setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_bAz0", "bit")
    52  		setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_OPTS_IN_port", "BIND_PORT")
    53  		setEnv(t, "BIND_PORT", "8080")
    54  
    55  		config, err := New("MYPREFIX")
    56  		assert.Equal(t, Config{
    57  			Name: "myprefix",
    58  			Opts: Opts{
    59  				File:   "/some/path.gorp",
    60  				Format: "gorp",
    61  				Inputs: map[string]string{
    62  					"port": "BIND_PORT",
    63  				},
    64  			},
    65  			Values: map[string]string{
    66  				"FOO":  "bar",
    67  				"bAz0": "bit",
    68  				"port": "8080",
    69  			},
    70  			registry: defaultRegistry,
    71  		}, config)
    72  		assert.NoError(t, err)
    73  	})
    74  
    75  	t.Run("missing required var", func(t *testing.T) {
    76  		setEnv(t, "MYPREFIX_OPTS_IN_port", "BIND_PORT")
    77  		_, err := New("MYPREFIX")
    78  		assert.EqualError(t, err, `myprefix: Missing required environment variables: BIND_PORT`)
    79  	})
    80  
    81  	t.Run("missing config name", func(t *testing.T) {
    82  		_, err := New("")
    83  		assert.EqualError(t, err, "Config name is required")
    84  	})
    85  
    86  	t.Run("bad config name", func(t *testing.T) {
    87  		_, err := New("not a valid name")
    88  		assert.EqualError(t, err, `not a valid name: Config names must only use letters or numbers: "not a valid name"`)
    89  	})
    90  }
    91  
    92  func TestWrite(t *testing.T) {
    93  	dir := t.TempDir()
    94  	tempFile := filepath.Join(dir, "temp.gorp")
    95  	templateFile := filepath.Join(dir, "template.gorp")
    96  	require.NoError(t, ioutil.WriteFile(templateFile, nil, 0600))
    97  
    98  	for _, tc := range []struct {
    99  		description     string
   100  		config          Config
   101  		unmarshalResult map[string]interface{}
   102  		expectMarshal   interface{}
   103  		marshalErr      error
   104  		expectErr       string
   105  	}{
   106  		{
   107  			description: "one pair",
   108  			config: Config{
   109  				Opts: Opts{Format: "gorp", File: tempFile},
   110  				Values: map[string]string{
   111  					"A": "B",
   112  				},
   113  			},
   114  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   115  				"A": "B",
   116  			},
   117  		},
   118  		{
   119  			description: "nested key paths",
   120  			config: Config{
   121  				Opts: Opts{Format: "gorp", File: tempFile},
   122  				Values: map[string]string{
   123  					"A":               "B",
   124  					"c.d.some_subkey": "some value",
   125  				},
   126  			},
   127  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   128  				"A": "B",
   129  				"c": map[string]interface{}{
   130  					"d": map[string]interface{}{
   131  						"some_subkey": "some value",
   132  					},
   133  				},
   134  			},
   135  		},
   136  		{
   137  			description: "array paths",
   138  			config: Config{
   139  				Opts: Opts{Format: "gorp", File: tempFile},
   140  				Values: map[string]string{
   141  					"A.1.B": "D",
   142  					"A.0.B": "C",
   143  				},
   144  			},
   145  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   146  				"A": []interface{}{
   147  					map[string]interface{}{"B": "C"},
   148  					map[string]interface{}{"B": "D"},
   149  				},
   150  			},
   151  		},
   152  		{
   153  			description: "marshal err",
   154  			config: Config{
   155  				Opts: Opts{Format: "gorp", File: tempFile},
   156  			},
   157  			marshalErr: errors.New("some error"),
   158  			expectErr:  "some error",
   159  		},
   160  		{
   161  			description: "template file defaults",
   162  			config: Config{
   163  				Opts: Opts{
   164  					Format:       "gorp",
   165  					File:         tempFile,
   166  					TemplateFile: templateFile,
   167  				},
   168  				Values: map[string]string{
   169  					"A": "B",
   170  				},
   171  			},
   172  			unmarshalResult: map[string]interface{}{
   173  				"C": "D",
   174  			},
   175  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   176  				"A": "B",
   177  				"C": "D",
   178  			},
   179  		},
   180  		{
   181  			description: "nested template fields",
   182  			config: Config{
   183  				Opts: Opts{
   184  					Format:       "gorp",
   185  					File:         tempFile,
   186  					TemplateFile: templateFile,
   187  				},
   188  				Values: map[string]string{
   189  					"A.B.C": "1",
   190  					"F.0.I": "2",
   191  				},
   192  			},
   193  			unmarshalResult: map[string]interface{}{
   194  				"A": map[string]interface{}{
   195  					"B": map[string]interface{}{
   196  						"C": "D",
   197  						"E": "F",
   198  					},
   199  				},
   200  				"F": []interface{}{
   201  					map[string]interface{}{
   202  						"G": "H",
   203  						"I": "J",
   204  					},
   205  					"K",
   206  				},
   207  			},
   208  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   209  				"A": map[string]interface{}{
   210  					"B": map[string]interface{}{
   211  						"C": "1",
   212  						"E": "F",
   213  					},
   214  				},
   215  				"F": []interface{}{
   216  					map[string]interface{}{
   217  						"G": "H",
   218  						"I": "2",
   219  					},
   220  					"K",
   221  				},
   222  			},
   223  		},
   224  		{
   225  			description: "nested key array paths",
   226  			config: Config{
   227  				Opts: Opts{Format: "gorp", File: tempFile},
   228  				Values: map[string]string{
   229  					"A.B.0.C": "1",
   230  				},
   231  			},
   232  			expectMarshal: map[string]interface{}{
   233  				"A": map[string]interface{}{
   234  					"B": []interface{}{
   235  						map[string]interface{}{
   236  							"C": "1",
   237  						},
   238  					},
   239  				},
   240  			},
   241  		},
   242  	} {
   243  		t.Run(tc.description, func(t *testing.T) {
   244  			marshaler := &gorpMarshaler{
   245  				marshalErr:      tc.marshalErr,
   246  				unmarshalResult: tc.unmarshalResult,
   247  			}
   248  			tc.config.registry = newRegistry()
   249  			tc.config.registry.RegisterFormat("gorp", marshaler)
   250  
   251  			err := tc.config.Write()
   252  			if tc.expectErr != "" {
   253  				assert.EqualError(t, err, tc.expectErr)
   254  				return
   255  			}
   256  			assert.NoError(t, err)
   257  			assert.Equal(t, tc.expectMarshal, marshaler.marshaledValue)
   258  		})
   259  	}
   260  }
   261
